dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome to your AI-powered recruitment center.

toast.duplicatedDescription: Creating a new job with data from the original.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: Explore and manage all candidates in your database.

applications.title: Applications
applications.description: Manage all candidate applications for different positions.
applications.noApplications: There are no applications in the database.

evaluations.title: Evaluations Catalog
evaluations.description: Manage the available psychometric, technical, and language evaluations.

psychometric.title: Psychometric Evaluations
psychometric.description: Tests to measure aptitudes, personality, and behavior.

technical.title: Technical Evaluations
technical.description: Tests to assess specific technical skills and knowledge.

languages.title: Language Evaluations
languages.description: Tests to measure proficiency in different languages.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account and application settings.

companySwitcher.title: Manage Companies
companySwitcher.description: Select a company to view and manage its information.

passwordDialog.title: Update Password
passwordDialog.description: Enter your new password below. It must be at least 6 characters long.

forcePasswordDialog.title: Password Update Required
forcePasswordDialog.description: For security reasons, you must update your temporary password before continuing.

toast.logoutSuccessDescription: You have been successfully logged out.
toast.logoutErrorDescription: There was a problem trying to log you out.
toast.passwordUpdateSuccessDescription: Your password has been successfully updated.
toast.passwordUpdateErrorLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
toast.passwordUpdateErrorReauth: This operation requires a recent login. Please log out and log back in.

login.title: Log in to access your dashboard.
login.titleRegister: Create an account to start managing talent.
login.rootHint: Use email system@kognisync.com and password password123 to access as Root.

toast.loginErrorDescription: The email or password is incorrect.
toast.loginErrorTooMany: Too many failed attempts. Try again later.
toast.registerSuccessDescription: Welcome! A new account has been created for you.
toast.registerErrorEmailInUse: This email is already in use. Try logging in.
toast.registerErrorWeakPassword: The password is too weak. It must be at least 6 characters long.

footer.line2: 71-75, Shelton Street, Covent Garden, London, WC2H 9JQ, United Kingdom

main.title: Find Your Next Challenge
